thread.title: Great Job, Internet!: Donald Trump thinks a lot of things go “Bing bing bing!”
thread.title_full: Great Job, Internet!: Donald Trump thinks a lot of things go “Bing bing bing!”

author: William Hughes
title: Great Job, Internet!: Donald Trump thinks a lot of things go “Bing bing bing!”
text:
Feb 7, 2017 8:50 PM This photo isn't of Trump saying Bing; we just thought it was funny. (Photo: Pool/Getty Images) This photo isn't of Trump saying Bing; we just thought it was funny. (Photo: Pool/Getty Images) Share Tweet 
We all know that our current president is fond of claiming that he has the “best, most powerful words.” Little did we know, though, that the most powerful word (?) in the English language—on the strength of how often Donald Trump uses it—may very well be “Bing!” Vice News has done God’s work by compiling a video of the many, many things Trump thinks goes “Bing!“—or, in some cases, “Bing, bing, bang, bang, boong”—into one depressingly onomatopoeic place. 21 things that President Trump says make a “bing” sound pic.twitter.com/7e1Smlwoai — VICE News (@vicenews) February 7, 2017 
In case you don’t have time to watch it, here’s a quick list of things that make our current president sound like a broken robot, or possibly a spokesperson for a second-run search engine: maps, his enemies, toilet tunnels, people being dropped out of planes, Anthony Weiner, and gunfire. Bing! 
Submit your Great Job, Internet tips here . Filed Under: AUX, Donald Trump, Bing More Great Job, Internet!
